completedPRs.title: Update USB driver documentation
completedPRs.description:
## Why is this change being made?

Developers were confused about the power management API usage patterns. Documentation needed to be updated to reflect recent API changes.

## What changed?

Updated API reference documentation for USB4 power management functions. Added code examples for D3cold transitions.

## How was the change tested?

Documentation was reviewed by 3 team members and validated against current code.

completedPRs.title: Add I3C bus validation tests
completedPRs.description:
## Why is this change being made?

I3C bus implementation lacked comprehensive validation tests. This change adds test coverage for edge cases.

## What changed?

Added 15 new validation tests for I3C bus initialization and error handling scenarios.

## How was the change tested?

All tests were run on physical hardware with various I3C devices. Tests pass on both Intel and AMD platforms.

completedPRs.title: Fix memory leak in USB hub driver
completedPRs.description:
## Why is this change being made?

Memory leak was discovered during long-running stress testing. Leak occurs when USB devices are repeatedly connected and disconnected.

## What changed?

Fixed memory allocation in USB hub device enumeration path. Added proper cleanup in error paths.

## How was the change tested?

Ran 72-hour stress test with continuous device connect/disconnect cycles. No memory growth observed.
